name: Cat-Cow to Cobra Stretch
cues: Segment the spineâ€”think wave rolling from tailbone to head
In Cobra: lift through sternum, not by shrugging
Keep glutes relaxed in Cobra to avoid excessive lumbar compression
Breathe rhythmically; let breath guide motion
safety: Discontinue if numbness, tingling, or sharp back pain occurs. Mild muscular stretch across abdominals/hip flexors is normal.
